items.content_html: BunPulse is a lightweight, high-performance WebSocket server built on Bun, fully compatible with the Pusher protocol. With BunPulse, you can easily implement real-time communication in your applications, benefiting from blazing-fast performance, scalability, and secure connections with minimal setup.
items.title: stephenjason89/bun-pulse: BunPulse is a lightweight, high-performance WebSocket server built on Bun, fully compatible with the Pusher protocol. With BunPulse, you can easily implement real-time communication in your applications, benefiting from blazing-fast performance, scalability, and secure connections with minimal setup.

items.content_html: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.
items.title: TAGCH/Workflow-Automation: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.

items.content_html: ValidatorPK is a lightweight npm library designed to validate Pakistani phone numbers and CNICs with ease. It provides a simple API to check formats, identify mobile networks, and ensure data authenticity. Perfect for developers building applications for the Pakistani audience.
items.title: hamzarehman033/ValidatorPK:  ValidatorPK is a lightweight npm library designed to validate Pakistani phone numbers and CNICs with ease. It provides a simple API to check formats, identify mobile networks, and ensure data authenticity. Perfect for developers building applications for the Pakistani audience.

items.content_html: next-guard is a lightweight and flexible package for adding security to your Next.js functions. With an easy-to-use guard wrapper, you can protect your routes and actions effortlessly.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient WhatsApp bot designed to streamline interactions. Powered by the XSTRO API for core functionality, with Axios ensuring fast performance. Requires only a stable server internet connection.
items.title: AstroX11/Xstro: A lightweight and efficient WhatsApp bot designed to streamline interactions. Powered by the XSTRO API for core functionality, with Axios ensuring fast performance. Requires only a stable server internet connection.

items.content_html: File Viewer is a lightweight Node.js app for quick file uploads and instant previews of text-based files (.txt, .js, .php, .css). Ideal for developers managing plugins, small projects, or AI tools. Enables seamless code inspection, directory navigation, and efficient copy-paste operations, enhancing productivity and workflow optimization.

Ideal for developers managing plugins, small projects, or AI tools. Enables seamless code inspection, directory navigation, and efficient copy-paste operations, enhancing productivity and workflow optimization.
